doc:
Sam Scarber https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Scarber 0 Sam Willis Scarber (June 24, 1949) is a former American football fullback in the National Football League for the San Diego Chargers. He played college football at the University of New Mexico and was selected by the Dallas Cowboys in the third round (69th overall) of the 1971 NFL Draft. Sam_Willis_Scarber ( June_24_,_1949 ) is a_former_American_football_fullback in the_National_Football_League for the_San_Diego_Chargers . He played college_football at the_University of New_Mexico and was_selected by the_Dallas_Cowboys in the_third_round_(_69th_overall_) of the_1971_NFL_Draft .
